reviews.review_msg: REally helpful and responded to all questions quickly. She was extreamly fair too.

She was the supervisor for this course and the TA. She was horrible! Kept making up excuses for why she can't get to sfu to let you see your exams. She works at St.Joseph hospital in downtown vancouver so if you want to see her or look over your exams, she'll tell you to find her there. The course was easy but don't bother counting on her to help!
